description: These vegan pumpkin burgers are packed with hearty pecans, toasty spices, and topped of with creamy hummus and a dollop of apple relish!
name: Nutty Pumpkin Burgers with Apple Relish
recipeIngredient: 1 14 ounce can cannellini beans, drained and rinsed
1 tablespoon apple cider vinegar, (or more for extra tartness)
hummus (I recommend my roasted garlic hummus)

recipeInstructions.text: Place onion, garlic, beans, breadcrumbs, pumpkin puree, pecans, cumin, cinnamon and ginger into food processor bowl and pulse until finely chopped and well blended. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Shape into 4 to 6 patties.

Lightly oil the bottom of a skillet and place over medium heat. Working in batches if needed, arrange patties in skillet and cook until browned on bottoms, about 4 minutes. Flip and cook about 4 minutes more, until browned on opposite sides. Add oil to the skillet between batches, as needed, and repeat until all patties are cooked.
